00293 inline bool SubRouteList::getRouteOnHigherLevel() const
00294 {
00295    return ( ( m_listType == SubRouteListTypes::HIGHER_LEVEL_FORWARD ) ||
00296             ( m_listType == SubRouteListTypes::HIGHER_LEVEL_BACKWARD ) );
00297 }
00298 
00299 inline bool SubRouteList::isForwardRouting() const
00300 {
00301    return ( m_listType != SubRouteListTypes::HIGHER_LEVEL_BACKWARD ); 
00302 }
00303 
00304 
00305 inline bool
00306 SubRouteList::checkForLoops(uint32 subRouteID)
00307 {
00308    bool status = false;
00309    
00310    RMSubRoute* subRoute = getSubRoute(subRouteID);
00311 
00312    if (subRoute != NULL) {
00313       uint32 prevSubRouteID = subRoute->getPrevSubRouteID();
00314       while ((prevSubRouteID != MAX_UINT32) &&
00315              (prevSubRouteID != subRouteID)) {
00316          prevSubRouteID = (getSubRoute(prevSubRouteID))->getSubRouteID();
00317       }
00318       if (prevSubRouteID == subRouteID) {
00319          mc2log << warn << "subRoute loops" << "ID " << subRouteID << endl;
00320          status = true;
00321       }
00322    }
00323 
00324    return status;
00325 }
00326 
00327 
00328 inline uint32 SubRouteList::getTotalSize() const 
00329 {
00330    uint32 totSize = 0;
00331    for( uint32 i = 0; i < m_subRouteVect.size(); i++ ) {
00332       totSize += m_subRouteVect[ i ]->getPacketSize() + 4;
00333    }
00334    return totSize;
00335 }
00336 
00337 inline uint32 SubRouteList::getNbrSubRoutes() const
00338 {
00339    return m_subRouteVect.size();
00340 }
00341 
00342 
00343 inline RMSubRoute*
00344 SubRouteList::getSubRoute(uint32 index)
00345 { 
00346    if (index < m_subRouteVect.size()) {
00347       return m_subRouteVect[ index ];
00348    }
00349    else {
00350       return NULL;
00351    }
00352 }
00353 
00354 inline RMSubRoute*
00355 SubRouteList::setSubRouteAt( uint32 index,
00356                              RMSubRoute* val )
00357 {
00358    RMSubRoute* oldVal = getSubRoute(index);
00359    m_subRouteVect[index] = val;
00360    return oldVal;
00361 }
